721.sol":{"keccak256":"0x41bbb2c41036ca64b2f6c9e973e8cfaa113ebc42af86702cd0d267f915a7e886","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6bf6699c55e82c7af6ae90b61ea9643ca0c905097da9a31269319f1b5a2a696a","dweb:/ipfs/QmRJZa2UmWcRo6W8JnuomwzfjVtAS21QC8HKggxBhoPsU4"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/extensions/IERC721Metadata.sol":{"keccak256":"0x75b829ff2f26c14355d1cba20e16fe7b29ca58eb5fef665ede48bc0f9c6c74b9","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://a0a107160525724f9e1bbbab031defc2f298296dd9e331f16a6f7130cec32146","dweb:/ipfs/QmemujxSd7gX8A9M8UwmNbz4Ms3U9FG9QfudUgxwvTmPWf"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x447a5f3ddc18419d41ff92b3773fb86471b1db25773e07f877f548918a185bf1","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://be161e54f24e5c6fae81a12db1a8ae87bc5ae1b0ddc805d82a1440a68455088f","dweb:/ipfs/QmP7C3CHdY9urF4dEMb9wmsp1wMxHF6nhA2yQE5SKiPAdy"]}},"version":1}

params._minted: Amount of VELO minted this epoch

nudge().details: Throws if not epoch governor.      Throws if not currently in tail emission schedule.      Throws if already nudged this epoch.      Throws if nudging above maximum rate.      Throws if nudging below minimum rate.      This contract is coupled to EpochGovernor as it requires three option simple majority voting.

proposals(uint256).details: activePeriod => proposal existing, used to enforce one proposal per epoch

returns._0: True if proposal has been executed, else false

params._team: Address of the new team to be chosen

params._rate: New team rate to be set in basis points

MAXIMUM_TAIL_RATE().notice: Maximum tail emission rate in basis points.

MAXIMUM_TEAM_RATE().notice: Maximum team percentage in basis points

MAX_BPS().notice: Denominator for emissions calculations (as basis points)

MINIMUM_TAIL_RATE().notice: Minimum tail emission rate in basis points.

TAIL_START().notice: When emissions fall below this amount, begin tail emissions

WEEKLY_DECAY().notice: Decay rate of emissions as percentage of `MAX_BPS`

acceptTeam().notice: Accepts the request to replace the current team's address         with the requested one, present on variable pendingTeam

activePeriod().notice: Timestamp of start of epoch that updatePeriod was last called in

calculateGrowth(uint256).notice: Calculates rebases according to the formula         weekly * (ve.totalSupply / velo.totalSupply) ^ 3 / 2         Note that ve.totalSupply is the locked ve supply         velo.totalSupply is the total ve supply minted

nudge().notice: Allows epoch governor to modify the tail emission rate by at most 1 basis point         per epoch to a maximum of 100 basis points or to a minimum of 1 basis point.         Note: the very first nudge proposal must take place the week prior         to the tail emission schedule starting.

pendingTeam().notice: Possible team address pending approval of current team

setTeam(address).notice: Creates a request to change the current team's address

setTeamRate(uint256).notice: Creates a request to change the current team's percentage

tailEmissionRate().notice: Tail emissions rate in basis points

team().notice: Current team address in charge of emissions

teamRate().notice: Current team percentage in basis points

updatePeriod().notice: Processes emissions and rebases. Callable once per epoch (1 week).

weekly().notice: Starting weekly emission of 15M VELO (VELO has 18 decimals)

documentation.text: @notice Interface of Velo.sol
@notice Interface of Voter.sol
@notice Interface of IVotingEscrow.sol
@notice Interface of RewardsDistributor.sol
@notice Duration of epoch in seconds
@notice Decay rate of emissions as percentage of `MAX_BPS`
@notice Maximum tail emission rate in basis points.
@notice Minimum tail emission rate in basis points.
@notice Denominator for emissions calculations (as basis points)
@notice Rate change per proposal
@notice When emissions fall below this amount, begin tail emissions
@notice Maximum team percentage in basis points
@notice Current team percentage in basis points
@notice Tail emissions rate in basis points
@notice Starting weekly emission of 15M VELO (VELO has 18 decimals)
@notice Timestamp of start of epoch that updatePeriod was last called in
@notice Current team address in charge of emissions
@notice Possible team address pending approval of current team

@notice Creates a request to change the current team's address
 @param _team Address of the new team to be chosen

@notice Accepts the request to replace the current team's address
         with the requested one, present on variable pendingTeam

@notice Creates a request to change the current team's percentage
 @param _rate New team rate to be set in basis points

@notice Allows epoch governor to modify the tail emission rate by at most 1 basis point
         per epoch to a maximum of 100 basis points or to a minimum of 1 basis point.
         Note: the very first nudge proposal must take place the week prior
         to the tail emission schedule starting.
 @dev Throws if not epoch governor.
      Throws if not currently in tail emission schedule.
      Throws if already nudged this epoch.
      Throws if nudging above maximum rate.
      Throws if nudging below minimum rate.
      This contract is coupled to EpochGovernor as it requires three option simple majority voting.

@notice Processes emissions and rebases. Callable once per epoch (1 week).
 @return _period Start of current epoch.
